page.title: 07INDUSTRY IN AINTREE (2)
page.content:
{W.Flanagan & Son Ltd.} There they make guards for machines. The guards are safe because when you open the door of the machine it stops so you do not have an accident.
There has been a change in industry in{Aintree}in the last 20 years. There used to be a lot of large firms but now most of them have closed down and smaller firms have taken over.
{Jacobs Biscuits}used to employ a lot of people but now it mainly uses machines which make the same amount of biscuits or crackers as more people would make.
Sarah Armstrong Madelyn Russell Kirsty Welsh Shelley Millward Andrea Eastham Mark Stalker Philip Joslyn
